amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund related to the education of low-income children, which may include allowing funding under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to follow children from low-income families to the school children attend.

action.text: Amendment SA 515 proposed by Senator Alexander.

vote.text: Amendment SA 515 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 63.
